pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 6, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, October 6, 2016:

Montréal Quebec

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Quebec business associations.

1010 Sherbrooke West
Suite 510
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
